subject_terms_1:This is an identification card. It is printed in black ink on plain paper. The empty fields are filled with handwritten inscription in blue ink. There are two signatures at the bottom of the card. There are no tears seen on the card
 and the edges are slightly folded. documents (object genre) military vehicles drivers\u0027 licenses
